item.description: Come join us after work and relax with old and new friends. This is a new place and theyâ€™re looking forward to our visit. There is no charge. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 136 Main St.: I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main St., ramp top turn right, at next light turn right onto Chestnut St., at next light turn right onto Main Street, facility across street on left. Free parking on street after 5 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.
